ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: Additional education or resources about sleep (such as pamphlets, videos, discussion)

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: Referral to a sleep doctor/therapist/clinic

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: An overnight sleep study in a sleep lab

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: An overnight sleep study in your own home

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: Treatment for sleep

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: Other

Other than the components from this study (2-minute education video about sleep, 1-2 meetings with a therapist to discuss sleep), since your last assessment, have you or your child received any of the following?: Other, specify
What kind of treatment (for sleep) was it? Select ALL that apply: Prescription medication (such as trazodone)
What kind of treatment (for sleep) was it? Select ALL that apply: Over-the-counter medication (such as melatonin)
What kind of treatment (for sleep) was it? Select ALL that apply: Behavioral strategies/intervention (such as, keeping the bed (for sleep) only, or making changes to your child's sleep schedule)
What kind of treatment (for sleep) was it? Select ALL that apply: Other
What kind of treatment (for sleep) was it? Select ALL that apply: Other, specify
What kind of provider offered the treatment (for sleep)? Medical doctor (such as pediatrician, sleep medicine specialist)
What kind of provider offered the treatment (for sleep)? Therapist (such as psychologist, social worker)
What kind of provider offered the treatment (for sleep)? Nurse
What kind of provider offered the treatment (for sleep)? Other
What kind of provider offered the treatment (for sleep)? I'm not sure
